name: Ice Candy Match
description:
Play and enjoy the awesome Ice Candy Match for free and experience the ultimate candy matching fun!

Swap and link the sweet items and win levels, it’s fun and easy!

How to Play
- Swap and match 3 candy bars to create a line crush.
- Reach high scores using fewer moves.
- Complete the missions and beat the challenges.

Features:
- Hundreds of delicious levels
- Smooth and addictive gameplay.
- Colorful candy, awesome bonuses and boosters.
- Never ending fun with tons of fun puzzles and challenges.
